cause.description:
The Official Sponsor of Birthdays. Together we’re saving lives and creating more birthdays by helping you stay well, get well, by finding cures and fighting back.
Stay Well: We educate and empower people to help them prevent cancer. Get Well: We help patients and their caregivers make decisions and overcome obstacles in their personal fight. Find Cures: We fund groundbreaking research that discovers cancer's causes and cures. Fight Back: We help pass laws that defeat cancer and rally communities to join the fight.
For cancer information, anytime day or night, call us at 1-800-227-2345 or go to our web site at www.cancer.org.
Declare the American Cancer Society the Official Sponsor of your birthday at www.morebirthdays.com.
1. Stay Well: We educate and empower people to help them prevent cancer.
2. Get Well: We help patients and their caregivers make decisions and overcome obstacles in their personal fight.
3. Find Cures: We fund groundbreaking research that discovers cancer's causes and cures.
4. Fight Back: We help pass laws that defeat cancer and rally communities to join the fight.
cause.mission: The Official Sponsor of Birthdays. Together we’re saving lives and creating more birthdays by helping you stay well, get well, by finding cures and fighting back.
cause.name: Fight Cancer: Support the American Cancer Society
